mapper.select: select sub_order_id,place_id,place_name,seat_row,seat_col,md_price,mes_id,mes_name from tb_sub_order so join tb_order_new o on so.order_id=o.order_id join dm_message mes on mes.mes_id=o.order_msg_id join dm_history his on so.his_id=his.his_id join dm_seat s on s.seat_id=his.his_seat_id join dm_place p on s.seat_place_id=p.place_id join dm_det_seat ds on his.his_id = ds.ds_his_id join dm_detail d on d.detail_id = ds.ds_detail_id join dm_mes_det md on md.md_detail_id = d.detail_id and md.md_mes_id=mes.mes_id and o.order_id=#{orderId}
select o.order_id,order_num,order_user_name,order_price,order_condition,order_msg_id,mes_name from tb_order_new o join dm_message mes on o.order_msg_id = mes.mes_id and o.order_id=#{orderId}
select order_id,order_num,o.order_user_name,order_price,order_condition,order_msg_id,mes_name from tb_order_new o join dm_message mes on o.order_msg_id = mes.mes_id AND o.order_user_name=#{username}
select order_id,order_num,order_user_name,order_price,order_condition,order_msg_id,mes_name from tb_order_new o join dm_message mes on o.order_msg_id = mes.mes_id and o.order_num=#{orderNum}
